options: ['Take them with you everywhere you go.', 'Leave them in the room you live in.', 'Put them in the safe deposit boxes.', 'Call friends for help.']
questions: If you have some expensive things, where can you leave them when you live in the hotel?
article:
Please do not leave your valuables in your room unattended.
The hotel provides safe deposit boxes at the reception desk.
When you leave the hotel, please put your key at the reception desk.
